programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino‚Äôs efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee‚Äôs magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn‚Äôt stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee‚Äôs magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy‚Äôs house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee‚Äôs wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Tiggys Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he‚Äôs not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee‚Äôs magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy‚Äôs and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn‚Äôt get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy‚Äôs place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what‚Äôs happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia‚Äôs annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: SCHOOLS OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it‚Äôs party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: Heir To Stay
programme.desc: Sundar cleaning out the front of the shop is surprised to find a cheeky-faced snot-digging kid glaring at him bossily. Turns out its Chai Rajas one and only nephew whom the man dotes on but is in fact pest incarnate as far as Sundar is concerned. Pakru, the boy acts as if he owns the shop and finds inventive ways of harassing Sundar. Basha is amused and happily tries to help himself to some freebies while Sundar is kept occupied. But then, Basha receives a rude shock when Pakru extends his nastiness towards Basha as well! There is chaos in the shop as Pakru, being sly manages to out-think even the normally nifty Basha. Its complete chaos and the seething Basha decides to team up with Sundar and teach the bully Pakru a thing or two about defending ones territory. Pakru sensing this believes he has outprank them, but Basha and Sundar use the ace up their sleeve- their knowledge of Chai Rajas habits. With each passing minute, Chai Raja finds his favourite kettle smashed, his fritters burnt, his clocks spring sprung, his favourite spatula missing and each time Pakru is implicated! Finally losing his cool, Chai Raja boots Pakru out and Sundar gleefully turns to hi-five Basha- but the naughty monkey is already raiding the snack-shelf again! With an angry snarl, Sundar chases at Basha as the chai chai tune plays in the background.

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he‚Äôs a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man ‚Äì and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: A Smighty Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Leila and Zip go on an adventure to find the magical fairies of the forest. Sneevil has used magic to pretend to be a fairy and is looking to destroy them and steal the Earth Stone. With the help of the real forest fairies, the Super Six take back the Stone and save the day.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he‚Äôs optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee‚Äôs magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‚Äògrow faster‚Äô on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy‚Äôs suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn‚Äôt have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it ‚Äì and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat‚Äôs chase ends up in a haunted house‚Ä¶with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: HAI RE HIVE!
programme.desc: Chai Raja, right in the middle of the morning rush runs out of sugar and cant make more snacks. He orders Sundar to go get some but Sundar finds that the naughty Basha has stolen the tyres of the bicycle. If Sundar runs on foot, he will be too late and Chai Raja will lose customers. Thats when Sundar spots a beehive and gets a brainwave. Distracting the bees, he grabs the whole honeycomb and hands it over to Chai Raja. The snacks are super tasty , thanks to the honey and Chai Raja is pleased at Sundars quick thinking . Meanwhile the bees return and are mighty mad to find their hive gone. Basha, very generously points to honey paw marks leading to the hotel and the bees zone in on Sundar as the culprit. Basha gleefully points/uncovers Sundar each time he tries to hide.Basha literally becomes the commader of the bee army giving them all sorts of directions. Ultimate mayhem in the shop as Sundar finds out that sweet beginnings can have a very bitter and bee-bitten end.

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it‚Äôs the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai‚Äôs life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who‚Äôs in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders‚Äô absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is‚Ä¶whistle!

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Glass Tower
programme.desc: Buzz tells the others of a candy trapped deep in the basement of the library.he Creepy Candy embark on a dangerous journey and discover Bubbles, a pack of gum, stuck in a glass tower.Can they survive the perils awaiting them and find a way to save Bubbles? Tune in to find out!

programme.title: AMAZING FLYING MONKEY SHARKS
programme.desc: Victor and CeCe purchase a Grow Your Own Pets, kit at a local flea market. As the Creepy Candy are sweltering because of the broken air conditioner temptation gets the best of them. Disappointment turns into mayhem when the Creepy Candy dive into the mix! Will the pets come to life? Will the library be trashed? Tune in to the next episode to find out!

programme.title: How To Ride A Bike
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula‚Ä¶ How???

programme.title: Drill Bit
programme.desc: One day as the shop opens, Sundar sees a well-built fireman perform a fire drill for a small bunch of kids just outside the shop. Thoroughly in awe, Sundar wants to become a firefighter and much to Chai Rajas consternation, Sundar starts converting all his chores about the shop into fire-fighter training drills. Customers and Chai Raja go crazy as Sundar becomes over- zealous about becoming a fireman. However he is extremely clumsy and not to forget Basha who manages to make this training even more nerve-wracking for Chai Raja and the customers with his naughty pranks. There may be no fire but Chai Raja will surely conk out of heartburn if Sundar doesnt quickly end his training and resume waiting.

programme.title: Gummys Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather ‚Äì and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: Kramazon
programme.desc: Buzz watches Miss Paige order supplies before her vacation online and have it show up the next day. Buzz tells the others and the Creepy Candy hatch a plan to go shopping while Paige is away! Watch the chaos unfold in this hilarious episode when their order is delivered and the party begins!

programme.title: Colonel Nutbuster & the Candy Cane Ballerinas
programme.desc: It is indeed a silent night at the library on this Christmas Eve. The Creepy Candy are relaxing in the branches of the Christmas tree watching the snow fall outside as they wonder about the magic of Santa Clause.I am Colonel Harvey Nutbuster. My very own grandfather served with Santa during the Toy Wars. Like brothers they were! I know all about Santa!Harvey Nutbuster unlocks a book that is standing on the mantel and he clips the key to his belt and pushes the book open. The Candies strain to see inside.

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm ‚Äì and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‚Äògood luck‚Äô will protect him.

programme.title: Just A Day‚Äôs Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don‚Äôs life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit‚Äôs end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can‚Äôt imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table‚Ä¶

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky‚Äôs day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it‚Ä¶

programme.title: A Fog of A Different Color
programme.desc: When the Foggy messes with the Zoonicorns colors, Maple learns that the appearance of a thing does not define what it is. It‚Äôs not what‚Äôs on the outside that makes a thing/person what it is, but what‚Äôs on the inside

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: Treehouse Dreams
programme.desc: Odessa designs her own treehouse, but obstacles like no tree get in her way. With a little inspiration from the Zoonicorns, she still finds a way to make her dreams come true. Odessa learns to deal with setbacks in a positive way by being creative and rethinking things, then having the persistence to follow through.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Polka dots
programme.desc: YoHe wants to be like YoShe. Together with his sister he jumps into a world in which everyone and everything is a copy of a copy and he learns how much important it is to be different

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They‚Äôll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: The¬†Fast¬†Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Chill out!
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in the gaming world where an irascible frog is very angry: no wonder nobody ever wants to play with him, unless...

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and ‚Äútrouble‚Äù.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don‚Äôs house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it ‚Äì and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse‚Äôs hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: The Fastest Porter in the Land
programme.desc: Aladdins in big trouble when he forgets to deliver the egg traders eggs to market. Luckily Jamillah brings him a bike. After teaching him how to ride, they head off to deliver the eggs only for them to break them along the way. They eventually have to ask Genie to help by conjuring some eggs. After a few failed attempts it seems he manages it but we discover Genies magic eggs have a surprise inside that delights the customers.

programme.title: Top Turtle
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: Unready To Rumble
programme.desc: Wally K‚Äôs bullying moves Fred to challenge him to a fight, secretly confident that Friday can become special fighting gloves for him. When Friday loses his memory though, Fred tries to cancel the fight, but can‚Äôt. Luckily, an attack by the cute aliens, the Cuddlemuffins take Wally down, and Fred gets the credit.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino‚Äôs timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can‚Äôt stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee‚Äôs magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy‚Äôs cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle‚Äôs shoe, in Mewmew‚Äôs garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Poder De La flor
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Let's Go Camping~
programme.desc: Friends are camping today. Sitting around the campfire, they decide to grill some sausages. Scot goes to look for them in their hiding place, but theyre not there! Friends believe that Scot is up to his old tricks and has hidden them for himself. They remind him of the last time he hid food... and it turns out that it was the same day the gang met Duda for the first time. Admitting that he wasnt the one eating the snacks he had hidden then, Scot begins to tell his friends what really happened that day. And it looks like a cute little mole that lives underground may have been the unwitting culprit.

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV ‚Äì and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: A Lucky Accident
programme.desc: Maple accidentally breaks Pancake‚Äôs favorite toy, and he blows up at her. Pancake gains a different perspective about his reaction when, in the Zooniverse, he accidentally breaks a gigantic weather making machine, creating an assortment of weird weather conditions that threaten the Zooniverse. Be slow to lay blame when accidents happen; and resilient in solving the problems when they do.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Follow The Leader
programme.desc: Duda and his friends are in the Pinkar Choir. Duda seems a little deaf, so Dada suggests that he directs instead. On the day of his last rehearsal, before the concert, Duda is waiting for his friends. He goes to find them and tries to get them to come to rehearsal, but they all seem busy with other things. Duda gets upset because no one listens to him. So he tells Scot to be the director. At first, Scot is ecstatic; However, after hearing Duda sing, he begs him to continue directing and even gives him a magic conductors baton. Is the magic baton really magic? And will he make everyone listen to Doubt?

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can‚Äôt decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only ‚Äúcleaned‚Äù Charlie‚Äôs wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy‚Äôs yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: I got Taller
programme.desc: Scot makes fun of Duda for being short. Annoyed, Duda tries everything to grow. Finally, he asks Scot for help. Scot says he knows a magic spell that makes you taller. It is a spell that only works in the afternoon and when it is sunny. So Duda does everything Scot tells him to do and sees that his shadow has gotten taller. His sudden growth gives Duda the strength and courage to help his friends in need. But when his shadow disappears at night, Duda feels worthless and depressed because he has returned to his little self. Soon, Scot appears and blurts out that he has invented the magic spell that makes Doubt question all of his heroic acts that day. If Duda didnt grow up, then how did he help all his friends?

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of ‚Äúmacho man‚Äù a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors ‚Äì the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Hi Five
programme.desc: Pancake splits off four copies of himself, which makes trying to catch them five times more difficult! And he‚Äôs having trouble counting that high. Always keep trying/resilience to failure.

programme.title: Assaf The Magician ‚Äì Aladdin
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of ‚ÄúAladdin and the Magic Lamp‚Äù. The Sultan, the PRINCESS‚Äôs father, requires their detective services, as the evil magician ASSAF has returned and has stolen ALADDIN‚Äôs lamp. Not content with this, the perfidious magician has ordered the GENIE kill ALADDIN and then take his palace, with the PRINCESS inside, and transport it to his lair, in the distant Atlas Mountains. SANDRA will face the most powerful magician in the Thousand and One Nights with her only weapon: her ingenuity.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift ‚Äì a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house ‚Äì for the first time. But how???

programme.title: The Great Conspiracy
programme.desc: All of Braianna‚Äôs enemies are brought together by the villainous Egghead. Brains is trying to get promoted, even though a higher title would mean she‚Äôd have to move away.

programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: The Cup Final ‚Äì Snow Queen
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SNOW QUEEN, by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by GERDA, a young girl, whose best friend, KAY, has been whisked off by a white sleigh, driven by an enigmatic woman dressed in white furs. She is the SNOW QUEEN, who has taken KAY to her palace at the North Pole. After a kiss from the SNOW QUEEN, the boy has lost all his memories and is now a prisoner in the palace of ice. SANDRA and FO will have to find him and rescue him from the powerful Lady of Winter.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi‚Äôs wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children‚Äôs eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: 20 Days

Yet for Edrick‚Äôs best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we‚Äôll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating ‚Äì roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities‚Äô cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game ‚Äì as long as they crave it. And there‚Äôs a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish ‚Äì guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"
